name: Soulbound (Fenderbate)
description:
You’re the protector of the soulfire. Your job is to keep away monsters who with to claim it’s power. If the lame dies, you do as well.

Contols
  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - W/Space
  • Attack - Left click
  • Activate Soulblade - E
Tools used
  • Godot 3.2
  • Aseprite
  • BoscaCeoil
  • Bfxr
